# Tender Notice

**National Nurse Scheduler (NNS) Contract**

**Contract Number:** 1000254069
**Contract Title:** National Nurse Scheduler (NNS) Contract
**Contractor:** Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)
**Contract Period:** From May 1, 2024 to April 30, 2028

## Tender Overview

ISC has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a contractor to provide a National Electronic Scheduling System (NNS) for Healthcare Professionals (HCPs) serving in First Nations and Inuit communities in Canada. The contractor must provide a secure, bilingual (English and French), and accessible electronic scheduling system that meets the needs of HCPs and ISC.

## Background

ISC's First Nations and Inuit Health Branch (FNIHB) requires an NNS to ensure the right HCPs are deployed to the correct location at the right time. The NNS will also enable ISC to optimize workforce utilization, generate comparison and reporting, and provide real-time analytics.

## Scope of Work

The contractor will be responsible for:

* Acquiring, training, implementing, migrating, developing, testing, and phasing-in the NNS
* Providing ongoing technical assistance and guidance

## Key Stakeholders

* Healthcare Professionals
* Nurse Management and Schedulers
* Data Team
* Travel Team
* FNIHB Senior Management
* Indigenous Peoples and their families

## Objectives

* Ensure HCPs have an easy and secure access to a national electronic scheduling system
* Provide a high-quality service that meets the needs of ISC and HCPs
* Enhance the Department's ability to deliver its mandate
* Reduce administrative burden and provide timely and effective scheduling

## Evaluation Criteria

* Technical Merit
* Price
* Proven Experience in Providing NNS Solutions

## Frequency of Deliverables

* Regular Progress Reports
* Timely Delivery of the NNS

## Submissions and Deadline

Submissions must be received by April 2, 2024, at 14:00 EDT. The contact person for this tender is:

* Alex Cormier Howie, Contracting Authority
* Telephone: (873) 354-0959
* Email: [Alexander.cormierhowie@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:Alexander.cormierhowie@sac-isc.gc.ca)
